Source code for Playground.my_utils.staff.set

[docs]class Set:
    def __init__(self, value=[]):
        self.data = []
        self.concat(value[:])


[docs]    def intersect(self, other):
        res = []
        for x in self.data:
            if x in other:
                res.append(x)
        return Set(res)



[docs]    def union(self, other):
        res = self.data[:]
        for x in other:
            if not x in res:
                res.append(x)
        return Set(res)



[docs]    def concat(self, value):
        for x in value:
            if not x in self.data:
                self.data.append(x)


    def __len__(self):
        return len(self.data)

    def __getitem__(self, item):
        return self.data[item]

    def __add__(self, other):
        return self.intersect(other)

    def __or__(self, other):
        return self.union(other)

    def __repr__(self):
        return 'Set: ' + repr(self.data)
